Generation VII.Sun: One of several mysterious Ultra Beasts. People on the street report observing those infested by it suddenly becoming violent.
Generation VII.Moon: One of the Ultra Beasts. It's unclear whether or not this Pokémon is sentient, but sometimes it can be observed behaving like a young girl.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: A life-form from another world, it was dubbed a UB and is thought to produce a strong neurotoxin.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It appeared in this world from an Ultra Wormhole. Nihilego appears to be a parasite that lives by feeding on people and Pokémon.

Generation VII.Sun: Diglett's Tunnel or Wela Volcano Park ( Only one for either location)
Generation VII.Moon: Diglett's Tunnel or Wela Volcano Park ( Only one for either location)

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one , requires unlocking the They Came From The Ultra Beyond! adventure)
